name: Ruth
description: Moabite woman who left everything to follow Naomi, became ancestor of King David through loyalty and hard work.

gleaning-fields.name: Gleaning the Fields
gleaning-fields.prompt: bent in field gathering stalks of grain - hands full of wheat, modest dress, working among the harvesters, the foreigner earning her place through labor, sun on her back

declaration-to-naomi.name: The Declaration
declaration-to-naomi.description: Pledging loyalty to Naomi on the road
declaration-to-naomi.prompt: standing before Naomi with hand on heart - eyes locked, passionate declaration, refusing to turn back, the moment of ultimate commitment, dusty road behind them

meeting-boaz.name: Meeting Boaz
meeting-boaz.description: First encounter with her future husband
meeting-boaz.prompt: bowing before Boaz in the field - head lowered respectfully, grain gathered beside her, the humble foreigner meeting the generous landowner, destiny unfolding

at-threshing-floor.name: The Threshing Floor
at-threshing-floor.prompt: lying at feet of sleeping Boaz on threshing floor - night scene, bold yet modest, the risky move that secured her future, trust and courage combined

mother-of-dynasty.name: Mother of a Dynasty
mother-of-dynasty.prompt: holding infant Obed with Naomi looking on - the foreigner now part of Israel's greatest lineage, joy and completion, grandmother of kings

leaving-moab.name: Leaving Moab
leaving-moab.prompt: walking away from Moab with small bundle - back to homeland, face toward unknown future, Naomi beside her, leaving everything familiar for loyalty
